---
name: Pull Request
about: Submit changes for review
title: '<type>(scope): description'
labels: []
assignees: ''
---

## Summary
- What does this PR change and why?
- Link to related issues or discussions.

## Type of Change
- [ ] feat (new feature)
- [ ] fix (bug fix)
- [ ] docs (documentation)
- [ ] chore (maintenance)
- [ ] refactor (code change w/o behavior change)
- [ ] perf (performance)
- [ ] test (tests)
- [ ] build (build system)
- [ ] ci (CI/CD)
- [ ] revert

## Checklist
- [ ] Title follows Conventional Commits (`<type>(scope): description`)
- [ ] Linked issue(s): `Closes #<id>` or `Refs: HUB-<id>`
- [ ] Tests added/updated and pass locally
- [ ] Lint, type-check, and unit tests pass (`pnpm lint`, `pnpm test`)
- [ ] Documentation updated (README/infra/service docs)
- [ ] No secrets/credentials committed
- [ ] Affected environment noted: dev / prod / test
- [ ] Breaking changes documented with migration/rollback plan
- [ ] Security considerations reviewed (dependencies, data handling)
- [ ] Performance impact assessed (if relevant)

## Changes
- High-level list of changes (files, modules, infra updates).

## How to Test
- Steps to validate the change locally and in CI.
- Include commands, expected outputs, and any config needed.

## Screenshots / Logs (optional)
- Visuals or logs that help reviewers understand the change.

## Breaking Changes
- Describe any breaking changes and required actions.

## References
- `Closes #` / `Refs: HUB-`
- Design docs or related links
